00088 class EGS_ANGULAR_SPREAD_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_AngularSpreadSource :
00089     public EGS_BaseSource {
00090 
00091 public:
00092 
00093     EGS_AngularSpreadSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00094     ~EGS_AngularSpreadSource() {
00095         EGS_Object::deleteObject(source);
00096     };
00097 
00098     EGS_I64 getNextParticle(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00099                             int &q, int &latch, EGS_Float &E, EGS_Float &wt,
00100                             EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u) {
00101         EGS_I64 c = source->getNextParticle(rndm,q,latch,E,wt,x,u);
00102         //egsInformation("\nGot u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",u.x,u.y,u.z);
00103         if (sigma > 0) {
00104             EGS_Float cost;
00105             do {
00106                 cost = 1 + sigma*log(1 - rndm->getUniform());
00107             }
00108             while (cost <= -1);
00109             EGS_Float cphi, sphi;
00110             rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00111             EGS_Float sint = sqrt(1-cost*cost);
00112             u.rotate(cost,sint,cphi,sphi);
00113             //egsInformation("sampled cost=%g -> unew=(%g,%g,%g)\n",cost,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00114         }
00115         return c;
00116     };
00117     EGS_Float getEmax() const {
00118         return source->getEmax();
00119     };
00120     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00121         return source->getFluence();
00122     };
00123     bool storeState(ostream &data) const {
00124         return source->storeState(data);
00125     };
00126     bool setState(istream &data) {
00127         return source->setState(data);
00128     };
00129     bool addState(istream &data_in) {
00130         return source->addState(data_in);
00131     };
00132     void resetCounter() {
00133         source->resetCounter();
00134     };
00135 
00136     bool isValid() const {
00137         return (source != 0);
00138     };
00139 
00140 protected:
00141 
00142     EGS_BaseSource     *source; 
00143     EGS_Float           sigma;
00144 
00145     void setUp();
00146 
00147 };
00148 
00149 #endif
